name: @my-solution/my-app-e2e
description: All e2e tests of the my-app app.
author: Stewart Armbrecht

scripts.test: npm run test-web && npm run test-mobile
scripts.eas-build-pre-install: cd ../../ && node tools/scripts/eas-build-pre-install.mjs . apps/my-app && cp package-lock.json apps/my-app && tools/scripts/eas-build-pre-install.sh
